author: Terrence McCoy and Heloísa Traiano, The Washington Post
title: Brazil's Bolsonaro: It's just 'a little cold'...
description:
RIO DE JANEIRO - He said self-isolation was "mass confinement." He called the novel coronavirus a "little cold." He asked, if only people older than 60 are at risk, "why close the schools?" 
 This was Jair Bolsonaro, leader of Latin America's largest country,…
content:
RIO DE JANEIRO - He said self-isolation was "mass confinement." He called the novel coronavirus a "little cold." He asked, if only people older than 60 are at risk, "why close the schools?"
This was Jair Bolsonaro, leader of Latin America's largest country, … [+5615 chars]
